summary: The life and love story of Argentina's famous tango dancers Maria Nieves Rego and Juan Carlos Copes, who met as teenagers and danced together for nearly fifty years until a painful separation tore them apart.
cast: María Nieves Rego|Juan Carlos Copes|Johana Copes|Myriam Copes|Ayelén Álvarez Miño|Juan Malizia|Melina Brutman|Brenda Angiel|Francesca Santapá|Alejandra Gutty|Leonardo Cuello|Pancho Martínez Pey|Pablo Verón
title: Un tango más
